org.hibernate.transaction
Class JDBCTransaction

java.lang.Object
  org.hibernate.transaction.JDBCTransaction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transaction
public class JDBCTransaction
extends Object
implements Transaction

Implements a basic transaction strategy for JDBC connections.This is the default Transaction implementation used if none is explicitly specified.

Author:
Anton van Straaten, Gavin King

          Set the transaction timeout for any transaction started by a subsequent call to begin() on this instance.
